page.title: 13Tavistock Wastesavers.
page.content: Tavistock Wastesavers mainly collect furniture which they restore and sell to the public.They also collect newspaper and wastepaper which they recycle and sell to a company in Plymouth.After a jumble sale they will collect the remaining items, some of which they will sell. The site at Wilminstone Industrial Estate is ideal for Tavistock Wastesavers' purposes because there is a lot of space for storage.If this site was situated in the town it would make the town look dirty and untidy. The original company was started by the Manpower Services Department in an effort to provide employment in the area but this company went bankrupt just over a year ago.The owners of Tavistock Wastesavers live in Tavistock and Mary Tavy.They have owned the company for one year.
